contributionDescription:
I'm real good advisor with a good connects and followers along all blockchain ecosystem. 

I'm very happy with the work done by the Optimism team and that is why I am applying as an advertiser to promote the latest network updates and projects. 

Also the adoption of the network is massive, and add the good track record of the $OP token.
